# AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO MEET
## `c93d2281b6607705dd7e17bfdc657538`
`Mr. KAUFMAN â€” 21 May 2009`

---


Mr. KAUFMAN. Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the 
Committee on Foreign Relations be authorized to meet during the session 
of the Senate on Thursday, May 21, 2009, at 10 a.m. to hold a hearing 
entitled ''A New Strategy for Afghanistan and Pakistan.''
